posts.post_content:
Posted By: Alan Elefson
Hi-
     Please see the scan below of the T206s I have for trade (4 total, the Kling is already gone).  I am looking for almost any other prewar card (strip cards are fine) in trade.  Obviously these are beaters (or worse than beaters if there is a lower distinction), so I am valuing them at about 5.00 each, so hopefully you have something to trade (anything but graded cards!).  Please let me know what you want to trade!
Alan Elefson
aelefson@hotmail.com
